english.segment1: I don't want to let my life fly by. Do you ever stop, stop to wonder why?
english.segment2: And time flies by. When everything is ok. It just turns out that life ain't that way. Big decisions overwhelm me and I know nothing's free
english.segment3: When I don't think of, think about much. People die and we don't know why. I could use some understanding. Human contact, sign that contract
english.segment4: I don't want to let my life fly by. Did you ever stop to wonder why-ever. stop to wonder, wonder why?
english.segment5: And time stands still when no one understands you. When you don't quite understand yourself. But just know this that God is faithful. Even if you don't have faith yourself
english.segment6: There's nothing quite like being sure of. What's inside your heart. It's mostly simple but not so easy. To know just where to start
english.segment7: Today didn't have to be this way. Tomorrow is another day. Another chance to make things right. A chance to make sense of last night
english.segment8: A chance to fully live your life. I don't want to, I don't want to, you don't want to
